sections.body: During Combat The warrior prefers melee combat and working with other soldiers. He uses alchemist's fire against targets resistant to weapon damage.
sections.name: Tactics

sections.body: Filled with bluster and swagger, a recruit lacks the discipline of an experienced soldier and can quickly lose resolve if he finds himself in over his head. A recruit works best in a large group under a strong leader who can keep all the soldiers in line and working together.
Left to his own devices, a recruit becomes bored and looks for entertainments such as drinking and gambling to pass the time.

defensive_abilities: defensive training (+4 dodge bonus to AC vs. giants)
